input_full.title: Add '/converge hardcore [goal]' mode
input_full.body:
Hardcore variant of `/converge` with stricter convergence behavior:

- **100% pass expectation** — no partial-pass exits
- **Do not stop** — keep iterating until goal is met (no max-iter bail)
- **Tick-tock introspection** — run introspect every OTHER cycle instead of every cycle
- **Recursive tick-tock for N+1 levels** — each introspection level (L2, L3, ...) follows the same alternating pattern: L2 runs every other converge cycle, L3 runs every other L2 invocation, etc.

Invocation: `/converge hardcore [goal]`

---
Created with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)
